channel.title: How can i fix my anti lag?
channel.description: i don't know anything about scar html java nothing..but i have antilag file in my server but every1 is lagging what do i do?i have all my windows closed but everyone laggs!

item.title: How can i fix my anti lag?
item.dc:creator: @rey123619 rey123619
item.description:
@rey123619 wrote:

First of all not to be mean but anti dont do shit man it has to do with how fast ur comp is and ur ram u need atleast 750mb of ram to have a server that can hold 15 people with me i can hold 25 with no lag with this is waht mine looks like go to start control panel system…

AMD Turion(tm) 64 Mobile Technology ML-34 1.79GHz,960 MB of RAM Physical Address Extension

item.title: How can i fix my anti lag?
item.dc:creator: @w3_0wn w3__0wn
item.description:
@w3_0wn wrote:

will that do anything?
[br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 09:54:56 PM[/size][hr]cmon people will this restart my server?? // This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 99999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
} [br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 10:00:17 PM[/size][hr]will it fix it?

Read full topic

item.title: How can i fix my anti lag?

item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Mod Adam:

Anti-Lag doesn’t stop lag. It just restarts your server.

a baby could learn english from that.

item.title: How can i fix my anti lag?
item.dc:creator: @w3_0wn w3__0wn
item.description:
@w3_0wn wrote:

well it’s not[br][size=1]Posted on: August 10, 2007, 09:53:00 PM[/size][hr]my anti lag folder says // This resets server every 30 mins to stop lag - xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class antilag
{

public int ResetTimer = 0;

public void resetserver()
{
misc.println(“RESETING SERVER!!!”);
misc.println(“Saving all games…”);
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
misc.println(“GAME SUCCESSFULLY SAVED FOR ALL PLAYERS”);
ResetTimer = 0;
closeListener();
runserver();
}
public void process()
{
ResetTimer += 1;
if(ResetTimer >= 99999999)
{
resetserver();
}
}

public void runserver()
{
try
{
String run = “runserver.bat”;
String xstr = “./”+run;
Runtime.getRuntime().exec(xstr);
}
catch (IOException ioe)
{
ioe.printStackTrace();
}
}

public void closeListener()
{
try {
server.shutdownClientHandler = true;
if(server.clientListener != null) server.clientListener.close();
server.clientListener = null;
}
catch(java.lang.Exception __ex)
{
__ex.printStackTrace();
}
}
}
